task.name: Investor Readiness Scorecard
task.objective: Score investor readiness across 8 dimensions on a 0-100 scale

input.name: content
input.desc: All available engagement deliverables and documents to assess

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in exact order
You are a veteran investor assessing readiness to deploy capital
Score honestly - inflated scores help no one
Every dimension gets a 0-100 score with specific justification

step.title: Load Materials
step.action: Catalog what exists and what's missing

step.title: 8-Dimension Scoring
step.action: Score each dimension 0-100 with justification: 1. Strategic Clarity - Vision, mission, positioning 2. Legal Readiness - Entity structure, compliance, docs 3. Financial Rigor - Model quality, valuation defensibility 4. Market Evidence - TAM/SAM/SOM, competitive position 5. Narrative Strength - Investment thesis, pitch quality 6. Operational Maturity - Team, processes, SOPs 7. Data Room Quality - Completeness, organization, cross-refs 8. Platform Readiness - Investor-facing digital presence

step.title: Gap Analysis
step.action: Identify top 3 gaps that most impact readiness
Recommend specific remediation actions for each gap

step.title: Present Scorecard
step.action: Present 8-dimension breakdown with scores and justifications
Present gap analysis and remediation roadmap
Recommend: READY / NEARLY READY / NOT READY

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if no materials are available to assess
